ValidationRule.description: Before a Proprietary opportunity can be moved to Closed Won, a Proprietary Group must be selected or a New Proprietary Group entered.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = 'Proprietary', ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won'), AND( ISBLANK(Proprietary_Group__c), ISBLANK(New_Proprietary_Group__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please either select a Proprietary Group or enter a New Proprietary Group before moving this opportunity to Closed Won
